H3091.def: = man, also known as {L:Hoshea<SDBH:הֹושֵׁעַ>} and {L:Jeshua<SDBH:יֵשׁוּעַ>}; ◄ son of {L:Nun<SDBH:נוּן>}; tribe of {L:Ephraim<SDBH:אֶפְרַיִם>}; ► one of the twelve men sent by {L:Moses<SDBH:מֹשֶׁה>} to spy out the land; his name was Hoshea, later changed by Moses to {L:Joshua<SDBH:יְהֹושֻׁעַ>}; Moses' assistant, who later became his successor and brought {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} into {L:Canaan<SDBH:כְּנַעַן>}

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H622.def: = process by which humans come together from different places and form a group for a common purpose, such as for a meeting or for war

H7626.def: = stick ◄ usually made of wood; ► attribute of a shepherd or a ruler, but also used for other purposes, such as beating, walking, fighting, etc.; ≈ associated with shepherding, authority, punishment

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H7927.def: = the upper part of the human body between the head and the chest; ≈ associated with heavy burdens, and, in a more figurative way, heave responsibilities

H2205.def: = state in which a human being is nearing the end of a long life

H7218.def: = upper part of the human body, or the front or upper part of the body of an animal, typically separated from the rest of the body by a neck, and containing the brain, mouth, and sense organs; ≈ associated with the entire person, that person's life, and that person's responsibilities

H7860.def: = person selected from among a group of people to assume a position of leadership and responsibility

H3320.def: = action by which humans or deities take position in a certain place for a specific purpose

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H3091.def: = man, also known as {L:Hoshea<SDBH:הֹושֵׁעַ>} and {L:Jeshua<SDBH:יֵשׁוּעַ>}; ◄ son of {L:Nun<SDBH:נוּן>}; tribe of {L:Ephraim<SDBH:אֶפְרַיִם>}; ► one of the twelve men sent by {L:Moses<SDBH:מֹשֶׁה>} to spy out the land; his name was Hoshea, later changed by Moses to {L:Joshua<SDBH:יְהֹושֻׁעַ>}; Moses' assistant, who later became his successor and brought {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} into {L:Canaan<SDBH:כְּנַעַן>}

H2205.def: = state in which a human being is nearing the end of a long life

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H748.def: = to be long or to increase in length

H310.def: = the side or part of something away from the spectator or from the direction in which it moves or faces

H3045.def: = process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind

H4639.def: = an activity performed by a person or deity

H6213.def: = causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H6106.def: = any of the pieces of hard, whitish material that together consitute the skeleton of humans and animals; ≈ associated with strength

H3130.def: = man; ◄ eleventh son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and first son of {L:Rachel<SDBH:רָחֵל>}; ► father of {L:Ephraim<SDBH:אֶפְרַיִם>} and {L:Manasseh<SDBH:מְנַשֶּׁה>}, each founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H5927.def: = process by which a substance or other object appears to move up by itself

H4714.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Ham<SDBH:חָם>}; ► regarded as founder of the {L:Egyptian<SDBH:מִצְרִי>} nation

H6912.def: = to put the body of someone who died in a designated place, such as a hole in a rock or in the ground, or in a place which was constructed specifically for this purpose; ≈ associated with death, but also with honor and respect

H7927.def: = the upper part of the human body between the head and the chest; ≈ associated with heavy burdens, and, in a more figurative way, heave responsibilities

H2513.def: = object that is owned by someone; ◄ usually with the underlying assumption that it has been shared out to that person (or his ancestors) in the past

H7704.def: = a piece of land generally uninhabited by human beings, but where one can find wild animals and plants and trees; consists of grasslands, fields, desert, or forest; can be used for farming, pasturing animals, and hunting; often used in contrast to inhabited land such as cities or encampments.

H3290.def: = man, also known as {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}; ◄ second son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>}; ► one of the patriarchs of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}; in poetic texts often used as a reference to the entire people of Israel

H854.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H7069.def: = action by which humans acquire an animate or inanimate object ◄ by means of a financial transaction or in another way

H2544.def: = domestic animal belonging to the same family as the horse, but smaller and with longer ears; it can have variety of colors from dark brown, through light brown to gray and occasionally white; ◄ |iEquus Asinus africanus;|i* ► used to ride on, carry loads, or do other work; ≈ highly regarded; for male see {L:עַיִר<SDBH:עַיִר>}; female see {L:אָתֹון<SDBH:אָתֹון>}

H1.def: = direct male progenitor; ► who normally provides protection, care, instruction, and discipline; ≈ is usually regarded with respect and associated with wisdom, security, and comfort

H3967.def: = state in which a countable entity is one hundred in number

H7192.def: = weight of unknown value; ► used as coinage

H5159.def: = process by which possessions are transferred from one generation to the next

H499.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Aaron<SDBH:אַהֲרֹן>}; tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; ► high {L:priest<SDBH:כֹּהֵן>}

H175.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Amram<SDBH:עַמְרָם>} and {L:Jochebed<SDBH:יֹוכֶבֶד>}; brother of {L:Moses<SDBH:מֹשֶׁה>}; tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; ► first high {L:priest<SDBH:כֹּהֵן>}

H4191.def: = process by which humans or animals stop living, either spontaneously or as a result of an act of aggression

H6912.def: = to put the body of someone who died in a designated place, such as a hole in a rock or in the ground, or in a place which was constructed specifically for this purpose; ≈ associated with death, but also with honor and respect

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H1389.def: = an elevation of the earth’s surface rising gradually and to a relatively small height from the surrounding level; generally lower than a {L:mountain<SDBH:הַר>}

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H6372.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Eleazar<SDBH:אֶלְעָזָר>}, high {L:priest<SDBH:כֹּהֵן>} during last phase of exodus; tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}

H2022.def: = a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a {L:hill<SDBH:גִּבְעָה>}

H669.def: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ son of {L:Joseph<SDBH:יֹוסֵף>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

141.dom: Names of People|Names of Groups|Names of Locations
